location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Charles Umpherston Aitchison, Foreign Department, Government of India, Calcutta to Colonel Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter regarding a lack of a response to Pelly's letter No.1094 of 28 July 1873 regarding the Mayo College and requesting further information for the Viceroy on the progress of boarding houses, and when they hope to require staff and teachers.The letter also approves Pelly's privilege leave and informs him William Howell Beynon will act in his absence.
